member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_BARRIER
member.summary: Describes a resource barrier (transition in resource use).

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_BARRIER.Type
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the type of resource barrier. This member determines which type to use in the union below.

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_BARRIER.Flags
member.summary: Specifies a enumeration constant such as for "begin only" or "end only".

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_BARRIER.Transition
member.summary:
A structure that describes the transition of subresources between different usages.
Members specify the before and after usages of the subresources.

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_BARRIER.Aliasing
member.summary: A structure that describes the transition between usages of two different resources that have mappings into the same heap.

member.name: D3D12_RESOURCE_BARRIER.UAV
member.summary: A structure that describes a resource in which all UAV accesses (reads or writes) must complete before any future UAV accesses (read or write) can begin.
